messages.message: I think it would be useful to show some visual marker for the drives/data sources you connected in the data sources dashboard. (Or some way to see the name of the member who connected it, either one). I personally would find it helpful in our internal environments but I can also see it being useful for customers. E.g. if you’re part of a shared workspace and multiple members have connected the same drive type using similar non-descriptive names (Google Drive, Google Drive 2, etc.) — it might take some time to figure out which one is yours if you wanted to disconnect it. A minor convenience.

Yea, another annoyance is that we don't accept `'` in the drive name, so we can't do `Xindi's Google drive` for example :lolcry:

We currently don't track who mounted the drive. Implementing this would require adding a new column to the `mount_points` table, which should be straightforward.
